panels.description: A weighted score over the selected timeframe taking into account all new errors, regressions and slowdowns. Weights are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Reliability Score

panels.description: The ratio between selected transaction volume and the number of $transactionFailureTypes which deem the call to be unstable.
panels.title: Failed Transactions

panels.description: The number of selected transactions whose avg time has increased by more than the critical slowdown threshold (as defined in the Settings dashboard) compared to the baseline period.
panels.title: Slow Transactions

panels.description: The number of new errors detected in the selected timeframe.
panels.title: New Errors

panels.description: Errors whose rate (i.e. times / calls) has increased significantly in the selected timeframe. The thresholds to control what is considered to be an increase are set in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Error Increases

panels.description: The number of unique errors of the currently selected types ($type)
panels.title: Unique Errors

panels.description: The number of calls into each of the selected transactions overlaid on total the number of calls (Throughput) into them.
panels.title: Transaction Throughput

panels.description: The number of errors in the selected apps overlad on the number of calls into the applications (Throughput). If no applications are selected, the first $splitLimit key applications are charted. Key applications are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Errors By App

panels.description: The response time of the selected transactions overlaid on the number of calls (throughput) into them.
panels.title: Transaction Response (ms)

panels.description: Chart errors according to key code tiers (e.g. AWS, SQL, Tomcat,..). Key code tiers are defined in the Settings dashboard. If no key tiers are defined, then 3rd party code tiers (as defined in  https://git.io/fpPT0) with the most errors are charted.
panels.title: Exceptions By Tier

panels.description: The number of errors of type: $type in the selected transactions overlaid on the number of calls (throughput) into them.
panels.title: Transaction Errors

panels.description: The number of critical exceptions for the currently selected transactions overlaid on the number of calls (throughput) into them. The list of critical exception types is defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Critical Exceptions
